welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Northbridge, the charming city known for its vibrant culture and historic landmarks. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving regional flights and private jets.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of T. F. Green Airport, servicing all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse within the main terminal, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse within the main terminal, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
